name: Cubed (nanda)
description:
Dash & ram, incinerate or avoid the hostile and sentient metals. Destroy the 4 giant cubes.

> Made for Nusantara Game Jam <

Controls :

Manual Mode :

Use mouse to control all the buttons Normal Mode : (Recommended)

ActionInput
Move forward/backwardW / S
Rotate left/right
A / DFire Weapon
Space 
DashF
